God and the devil by Firas Alsuah.

devil's history from ancient times until the devil that we know today, what changed the image of the devil, and when the devil really was born in mankind's thinking?


Firas Alsuah
Syrian's very famous intellectuals researcher in the history of religions and myths to understand the spiritual dimension in humans. Born in Homs / Syria 1941
